Description

All the commands that the client is allowed to perform on the server

Client backend that handles all the communication with the server through the TCP socket.

Defines the common interface for a frontend

clientRMI
Interface for a client that supports RMI
ClientSession
Class that handles a client session.
ClientState
Shared way of representing a client state.
Command
A user command
ConsoleHandler
A modified StreamHandler that closely resembles a java.util.logging.ConsoleHandler, the difference being that this handler publishes records to System.out
Constants
Some constants value that must be shared between the client and the server
GameDescriptor
Descriptor of a new game
GameDescriptor
Describes a completed game, either winning or losing

Represents a game shared by other users

LRUCache<K,V>
Simple LRU cache implementation based on LinkedHashMap
MessageStatus
Represents a possible message status that the server sends back to the client after a request has been processed
NoGameException
 
NotificationListener
Listen for notifications shared by other users in the multicast group
Pair<T1 extends Comparable<? super T1>,T2 extends Comparable<? super T2>>
Class template that provides a way to store two heterogeneous objects as a single unit.
PasswordIllegalException
 
RMIConstants
Some constants that need to be shared between the server and the client

Status code that is returned by a remote method
ServerError
 
ServerMain

serverRMI
This is the interface that defines which remote methods are available
